title: Ditch Or Date: Her Mom Used To Be In Love With Her Boyfriend's Dad?!
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’re starting to show their true colors, and you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if you should ditch or continue dating the person.
She just found out that her mom used to date the father of her current boyfriend. Her aunt warned her that the situation could be awkward because their relationship was serious.
What does she do? Continue pursuing him or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
